detail_desc: T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned, lightly crêped chiffon with a narrow stand-up collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. V-neck, jersey inner dress with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top of the front. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with decorative metal eyelets around the neckline and long sleeves.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in organic cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs. Concealed press-studs on one shoulder, a balloon-shaped tulle skirt with pompoms inside, and a sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.

Short dress in an airy chiffon weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and concealed press-stud at the top. Long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a frilled hem. Partly lined.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Lightweight jacket in a patterned weave with a lined, detachable hood and a zip down the front. Adjustable elasticated waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and no buttons.
Hair clips in plastic and metal with a sparkly stone text motif. Length 9 cm.
Satin blouse with a wide neckline, 3/4-length sleeves with wide, sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
No-show trainer socks in mesh with a silicone trim on the inside of the heels to hold them in place.

Soft, non-wired, ribbed jersey bra tops with cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. No fasteners. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Short, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with elastication and a frill trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets and straight legs.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton jersey. Top with a round neckline, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs. Dress with straps that have a button at the front, and a gathered seam at the hips to add width to the skirt. Lined bodice.
Short skirt in imitation patent leather with a visible zip at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Polo-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short top in soft, printed jersey with short sleeves and ties at the hem.

Long blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, yoke with gathers at the shoulders and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and ties. Covered buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and high slits in the sides and centre front.
Sleeveless, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a yoke that has gathered seams front and back. Smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in a fine rib knit. High waist with covered elastication and an overlocked hem.

Calf-length dress in spotted tulle. Round neckline with gathers at the front and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a seam and small frill trim at the elbows and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam with a small frill trim at the waist and around the skirt for added width. Short, V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow shoulders straps.

Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the hips. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft weave with a collar, V-neck opening and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Striped shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Set with a top and trousers. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Jersey trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Polo-neck jumper in a cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers in imitation leather with a perforated pattern, padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a faux fur-lined hood with a detachable, foldover faux fur trim. Zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front, a drawstring at the waist, side pockets with press-studs and a zipped sleeve pocket. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent with a drawstring. Quilted lining.
Gently flared top in soft organic cotton jersey with elastication and decorative gathers at the neckline and short, elasticated raglan sleeves.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Top with a flounce over the shoulders and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and frill-trimmed side pockets.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top, and a flounce around the neckline.

Suit trousers woven in a linen blend with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short skirt in imitation suede with a high waist, covered press-studs down the front, decorative seams front and back and a raw-edge scalloped hem. Unlined.
Long trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, and wide, gently flared legs.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and leather details.
Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Hat in a rib knit with faux fur pompoms on top and a turned-up hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey an appliqué on the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Trousers in woven fabric with beaded embroidery. Regular waist, a concealed zip in one side and tapered legs. Lined.
Wrapover blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the neckline, long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs, and smocking at the hem.
Short, A-line skirt in a jacquard weave with a regular waist and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and half-length sleeves with slits and ties. Unlined.
Sandals in soft leather with adjustable straps, moulded insoles and patterned soles.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with worn details and detachable elastic braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud.

Blouse in an airy, pleated weave with a wrapover front and a V-neck with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Low dropped shoulders, long dolman sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with wide ties.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.

Short-sleeved shirt in patterned Tencel™ lyocell with a turn-down collar and French front. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cycling shorts in lace with an elasticated waist, scalloped hems and jersey lining.
Longer, hooded cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets.
Jersey-lined trousers in narrow-wale organic cotton corduroy with covered elastication at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.
Ankle boots with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 4.5 cm.
Cardigan in a fluffy knit with a V-neck at the front and opening with ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and buttons down the front.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with embroidery on one back pocket. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Skirt in washed, stretch, patterned denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cap in marled fabric with imitation suede details and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back..
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and flared, elbow-length sleeves.

Shaping. Ankle-length, 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat, while also keeping the jeans in shape. The jeans have a regular waist and skinny legs.
Short wrap dress in an airy jacquard weave with a sheen and decorative fringes. V-neck, concealed press-studs at the top and waist, long sleeves and a seam at the waist. Lined.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Mesh trainers with glittery sections, rubber details, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
